channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Footways Slabs problem, 20th August
item.description:
Give and take 28 day plus temporary footway closure footway abrupt level different please remove x1 raised 750x600x25mm slab replace with tarmac patch stats required number 1 (FW Broken Slabs)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped Bedding Enclosing other Waste, 20th August
item.description:
The location is by the fence in the Pylons Car Park at the end of the Cleeve Common Road - next to the Plons enclosure. The waste probably came from a camper van given the increased overnight parking in this area by such vehicles. The other sheet appears to enclose other waste material. Please can it be removed as soon as possible.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles problem, 20th August
item.description:
Customer reporting TTL are red both ends and will move them, he says NG have finished but left the lights here and they are causing chaos. Customer has spoken to NG and they are looking into it but nothing yet.
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Light sensor is not detecting vehicles

item.title: Flytipped Building Waste, 20th August
item.description:
The location is the layby on Cleeve Common Road at the top of the rise after entering the road. The flytipped waste is in front of an old bulldozer used to block the gate. Please can the waste be removed

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
